headline: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.67% and +2.53%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Mettler-Toledo (MTD) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates

headline: Mettler-Toledo: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The Columbus, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $13.98 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $13.36 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: Mettler-Toledo: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The Columbus, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $13.98 per share. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, came to $13.36 per share. The results surpassed Wall Street expectations.

headline: Mettler-Toledo (NYSE:MTD) Posts Better-Than-Expected Sales In Q4 CY2025
summary: Precision measurement company Mettler-Toledo (NYSE:MTD) reported Q4 CY2025 results topping the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 8.1% year on year to $1.13 billion. On the other hand, next quarter’s revenue guidance of $910.3 million was less impressive, coming in 3.1% below analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $13.36 per share was 4.3% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
